resources.string:
Steps:
1) Go to Settings>Developer Options> Allow Mock Locations
 2) In the same menu. Associate ADB Mock Location with Mock Location feature 
3) Open command line and you can now push location with following command: 
 adb shell am start -n com.pacmac.adbmocklocation/com.pacmac.adbmocklocation.MockActivity --es latLon 49.224599,17.657078
